sentences.en: ‘I’ve passed all my exams’, he announced with satisfaction.
sentences.cn: “我通过了所有的考试。”他满意地宣布。
安东尼自鸣得意，忘乎所以。

sentences.en: Both sides expressed satisfaction with the progress so far.
sentences.cn: 双方对目前的进展都表示满意。

sentences.en: Exercise will give you a glow of satisfaction at having achieved something.
sentences.cn: 运动将让你体会到一种有所成就的无比喜悦感。

sentences.en: He nodded with a peculiarly male satisfaction at her capitulation.
sentences.cn: 对她的屈服,他以一种男人特有的满足感点了点头.

sentences.en: He tried hard not to smile in smug self-satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 他强忍住沾沾自喜的笑容。

sentences.en: I doubt I'll ever get rich, but I get job satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 我想我永远都不会富有，但是我在工作上很有满足感。

sentences.en: I noticed with great satisfaction that you made great progress.
sentences.cn: 我很满意地看到你取得了很大的进步.

sentences.en: If you can't get any satisfaction, complain to the park owner.
sentences.cn: 如果你得不到任何赔偿，向园区所有者投诉。

sentences.en: It gave me a feeling of satisfaction.
Looking at a beautiful painting always gives one satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 观看一幅美丽的图画常使人心满意足.

sentences.en: She felt a glow of satisfaction at her son's achievements.
sentences.cn: 她因儿子的成就而感到心满意足.

sentences.en: She got great satisfaction from helping people to learn.
sentences.cn: 她在帮助人们学习的过程中得到很大的满足。

sentences.en: She never could seem to do anything right or to his satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 她似乎从没能做过一件正确或令他满意的事。

sentences.en: Shop assistants should do their best endeavors to give the customers satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 店员应该尽力使顾客满意.

sentences.en: some amendments were made, not entirely to his satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 做了某些修正，但还没有达到使他满意的程度。

sentences.en: The compensations for the injuries seldom yield complete satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 伤害赔偿很少使受害人称心如意.

sentences.en: The happy news was a satisfaction to us all.

words.tran_cn: 满意的；符合要求的；赎罪的
可以满足的；可使满足的
令人满意的；令人满足的
满足；说服，使相信；使满意，使高兴

trans.tran_cn: 满足，称心，赔偿，妥善处理
trans.tran_en: a feeling of happiness or pleasure because you have achieved something or got what you wanted
